home.text:
Driven by curiosity and a love for challenges, 
I thrive at the intersection of creativity and technology. 
Beyond coding, I bring vision, leadership, and a relentless focus on efficiency. 
Turning ideas into scalable solutions that empower teams and brands to grow.

seo.title: Maëva Pasteur { '|' } Front-End Developer Freelance
seo.description: Freelance front-end developer specialized in Vue.js and Nuxt. I design fast, accessible and scalable interfaces for ambitious brands, from prototype to deployment.

seo.subtitle: My journey has led me to explore multiple worlds: from the elegance of luxury to the innovation of digital, through the rigor of healthcare and the creativity of culture. Each sector has offered me new challenges and perspectives, strengthening my ability to design tailored, relevant, and high-performing solutions.

bullets.1: Worked on high-impact projects for Butagaz, Airbus, Soufflet Group, Habiliv, Leo Pharma…
Rebuilt the agency website in React & Gatsby.
bullets.2: Shipped 10 Shopify themes (5 > €1M, 1 > €50M) for Cabaïa, Léo & Violette, French Bandit, Madura, Isotoner…
bullets.3: Became the first Shopify Expert; within a year the agency became a Shopify Plus Partner.
bullets.4: Delivered 95% of the new Citadium front alone, contributing to +$100M revenue.

bullets.1: E-commerce websites with Vue 3 & Nuxt for Victoria Beckham, Ami Paris, Carel, Marni, Armor Lux, Sud Express, Temperley London, Kids Around, Longchamp, Lacoste…
bullets.2: Custom CMS & Page Builder in Vue 3, Nuxt & Tailwind.
bullets.3: Variable-driven design system designed in Figma and integrated in Vue/Nuxt; reduced CSS delivery from 2 weeks to 2 hours.
bullets.4: Back-office built from scratch in Vue.js for 2,000+ monthly users and 50+ pages.
bullets.5: 30+ Shopify websites with custom apps for Isabel Marant, Sandro, Balzac, Aigle, Ba&sh, Hugo Boss, The Kooples, Bonpoint, Jérôme Dreyfuss, Lancaster, Maison 123, Tara Jarmon, Essentiel…
bullets.6: Modular Shopify theme cutting implementation from 4 weeks to 2 weeks.

seo.title: About - Maëva Pasteur { '|' } Front-End Developer Freelance
seo.description: Background, methodology and values of a freelance front-end developer Vue.js: product vision, leadership and efficiency in service of scalable solutions for teams and brands.

seo.title: Contact - Maëva Pasteur { '|' } Front-End Developer Freelance
seo.description: Let's discuss your front-end project (Vue.js, Nuxt, e-commerce, PWA, MVP). Availability, quotes and freelance collaboration terms.
Redesign of Citadium’s international e-commerce front end, 95% delivered solo in a PHP/Twig environment. Performance, SEO, accessibility, and well-crafted animations.

citadium.description:
Citadium is a flagship fashion retail brand in France with a demanding and engaged community. Its international e-commerce platform handles high volumes and targets ambitious business goals.
  • +400,000 unique users / month
  • ~2.3% conversion rate
  • ~$20M annual revenue
  • Desktop and mobile journeys with high UX/UI stakes
citadium.mission:
As part of the full brand overhaul led by W3lead, I redeveloped the entire front end of Citadium’s international e-commerce site in a PHP/Twig environment. Ambitious project with very high expectations in UX, UI, and animation. I delivered 95% of the front end solo.
  • Architecture: modular templates (Twig partials), reusable layout system, pixel-perfect UI components.
  • Stack: HTML · SCSS (clear architecture) · JavaScript ES6.
  • Performance & Core Web Vitals: media lazy loading, responsive images (srcset/sizes), preload/preconnect, critical CSS, minification.
  • Technical SEO: clean semantic markup, metadata, carefully designed internal linking.
  • Accessibility: keyboard navigation, focus states, contrasts, essential ARIA roles.
  • Creative development: micro-interactions and refined animations with no impact on load and overall fluidity.

wishlist.title: Wishlist animation
wishlist.text: We spark surprise at the exact moment of intent. CSS/SVG-first with minimal JS: a tiny script spawns randomized hearts that glide along SVG paths with smooth transitions. The result is a lightweight, fluid micro-interaction that sticks in memory and quietly builds loyalty without sacrificing performance.

conditions.title: Legal pages “opening crawl”
conditions.text: I made the legal pages roll like Star Wars, because why not ? Mostly CSS, tiny JS, big drama, fully accessible.

seo.description: Custom Shopify theme for Isabel Marant’s resale channel, with a trade-in flow in Vue 2 and performance optimization.

isabel-marant.description:
Isabel Marant is a Parisian fashion house with international reach, known for its effortless chic style and its Isabel Marant and Marant Étoile lines.
  • Founded: 1994
  • Network: 66 stores worldwide
  • €200 million in revenue
isabel-marant.mission:
Full development, as a freelancer for Faume, of a circular e-commerce platform: customers can sell their Isabel Marant pieces in exchange for store credits to spend on refurbished second-hand articles authenticated by the brand.
  • Shopify theme built end-to-end in HTML · SCSS · ES6
  • Interactive resale journey coded in Vue.js 2
  • Performance optimizations: image lazy loading, minification
  • Foundational technical SEO with clean semantic markup
  • Pixel-perfect integration, continuous deployment, and maintenance
  • Redesign planned

seo.description: Creation and continuous evolution of a Shopify theme for Jimmy Fairly with FittingBox virtual try-on and cross-sell mechanisms.

jimmy-fairly.description:
Jimmy Fairly is an eyewear brand founded in Paris, positioned on quality frames at fair prices and expanding rapidly across Europe.
  • Revenue: €95M
  • Network: 147 stores in Europe
  • Team: 380 employees
jimmy-fairly.mission:
Theme design and ongoing improvements at W3Lead, with a focus on performance and boosting average order value.
  • Integration in HTML · SCSS · ES6 on Shopify
  • Virtual try-on via the FittingBox API
  • Cross-sell: listings and carousels with smart suggestions
  • GitHub CI/CD pipeline and regular deployments
  • Post-launch follow-up: optimizations and fixes

virtual-try.title: Virtual Try-On
virtual-try.text: I integrated the virtual eyewear try-on solution into Jimmy Fairly’s e-commerce website by connecting the FittingBox API. This immersive feature allows users to try on frames in real time from their device, enhancing the online shopping experience and reducing returns.

seo.description: Nuxt/Vue 3 front end for Lacoste Second Hand, with trade-in flow and interactive map.

lacoste.description:
Lacoste is an iconic French brand founded by René Lacoste, with a major global retail and digital footprint.
  • Stores: 1,100
  • Countries: 98
  • Employees: 8,200
  • Revenue level: brand near €3B
lacoste.mission:
Development, as a freelancer for Faume, of a circular e-commerce experience in Vue 3 and Nuxt: dedicated site where Lacoste customers can exchange their worn items for store credits to acquire refurbished pieces from the brand.
  • Vue 3 · Nuxt component architecture and modular SCSS
  • Clothing-for-credit exchange system and second-hand marketplace
  • Interactive Mapbox map
  • SSR and responsive media for performance
  • Integration without mockups, based solely on existing brand guidelines

tradein.title: Online Trade-In Module
tradein.text: A simple and fast service that allows users to resell their Lacoste pieces in exchange for a voucher. They receive a price estimate in just a few clicks and give their items a second life.

seo.description: Second-hand platform for AMI with a Nuxt/Vue 3 front end and pixel-perfect mockup integration.

ami.description:
AMI Paris is a fast-growing ready-to-wear house distributed worldwide across retail and wholesale.
  • Revenue: > €300M
  • Boutiques: 75
  • Points of sale: 700+
  • Presence: 100+ countries
ami.mission:
Development, as a freelancer for Faume, of a circular AMI boutique in Vue 3 and Nuxt: platform enabling customers to exchange their AMI garments for credits to purchase second-hand pieces certified by the brand.
  • Reusable component UI kit
  • Dual journey: resale + circular shopping
  • SSR focused on SEO and load times
  • Refined micro-interactions
  • Multi-device quality checks

seo.description: Recommerce experience for Victoria Beckham with a Nuxt/Vue 3 front end integrated to the pixel.

victoria-beckham.description:
Victoria Beckham is a British fashion and beauty brand gaining momentum, with strong growth in recent years.
  • 2024 Revenue: £112.7M
  • 2024 EBITDA: £2.2M
  • Growth: fourth consecutive year of increase
victoria-beckham.mission:
Implementation, as a freelancer for Faume, of an eco-responsible Victoria Beckham boutique in Nuxt/Vue 3: customers can sell their authentic pieces for store credits to spend on second-hand articles curated by the brand.
  • Modular components and editorial layouts
  • Server-side rendering and asset optimization
  • Harmonized exchange-purchase journeys
  • Strict respect for visual identity
  • Testing and QA prior to go-live

seo.description: Carel second-hand interface built in Nuxt/Vue 3 with pixel-perfect integration.

carel.description:
Carel is a Parisian footwear house founded in 1952, renowned for its Mary Janes and Italian craftsmanship.
  • Founded: 1952
  • Revenue: €20M in 2023
  • Distribution: direct network, e-shop, and ~100 retailers
carel.mission:
Development, as a freelancer for Faume, of a circular e-commerce space for Carel in Nuxt/Vue 3: site enabling customers to bring their worn shoes in exchange for store credits to acquire refurbished second-hand models.
  • Component design system and editorial grids
  • Modular SCSS and responsive images
  • SSR and solid technical SEO
  • Subtle micro-interactions
  • Qualification on key devices

marni.description:
Marni is an Italian luxury house founded in 1994 and part of the OTB group, with an international retail network.
  • Boutiques: 96 worldwide
  • Group: OTB
  • HQ: Milan
marni.mission:
Creation, as a freelancer for Faume, of a circular Marni marketplace in Nuxt/Vue 3: customers can trade their worn Marni pieces for vouchers to explore a curated selection of second-hand articles from the brand.
  • Library of reusable components
  • SSR and media optimization
  • Smooth trading and circular shopping journey
  • Pixel-perfect fidelity to mockups
  • QA and validations before go-live

seo.description: Armor-Lux second-hand front end in Nuxt/Vue 3 with faithful mockup integration.

armor-lux.description:
Armor-Lux is a French company founded in Quimper, known for maritime apparel and local manufacturing.

  • Staff: 600 employees
  • Industrial sites: 3 in France
  • Boutiques: 100 in France
armor-lux.mission:
Development, as a freelancer for Faume, of an Armor-Lux circular exchange platform in Nuxt/Vue 3: customers can bring their worn maritime pieces in exchange for store credits to discover second-hand articles authenticated by the brand.

  • SSR, technical SEO, and responsive images

Sud Express is a Parisian women’s ready-to-wear brand founded in 1977 with an extensive retail and wholesale network in France.

  • Team: 320+ employees
  • Wholesale: 400 retailers

Design and development, as a freelancer for Faume, of a second-hand interface in Vue 3 and Nuxt, integrated without mockups based on the existing guidelines.

  • Unified trade-in and second-hand shop
  • SSR and perceived performance
  • Reusable editorial components

seo.description: Second-hand e-commerce platform for Temperley London with Nuxt and Vue 3. Reusable design system and tuned performance.

temperley-london.description: Temperley London is a British house founded by Alice Temperley, recognized for boho-luxury style and artisanal know-how. The brand enjoys international reach with a high-end clientele devoted to its iconic pieces.

Deployment, as a freelancer for Faume, of a recommerce experience faithful to the brand’s DNA, with a Nuxt and Vue 3 front end focused on performance and modularity.

  • UX clear purchase and trade-in journeys, detailed product pages
  • Performance SSR, code splitting, and responsive images
  • SEO clean semantics, internal linking, and metadata

kids-around.description: Kids Around brings together premium kids’ brands within a broad retail and digital ecosystem. The second-hand offer extends product life and strengthens parent engagement.

  • UX relevant filters by sizes, ages, and categories
  • Performance prefetch of critical views and HTTP caching
  • SEO clean routes and structured data
  • Quality strict typing and basic unit tests

seo.description: Longchamp second-hand experience with Nuxt and Vue 3. Design system and perceived quality at accessible-luxury level.

longchamp.description: Longchamp is a French leather goods house known for its iconic bags and strong international presence. The circular platform emphasizes durability and material quality.

vanessa-bruno.description: Vanessa Bruno is a Parisian house recognized for modern womenswear and iconic accessories. The second-hand initiative strengthens brand affinity.

seo.description: Multilingual ba&sh second-hand site with Nuxt and Vue 3. Vue 2 modules and Mapbox integration.

bash.description: ba&sh is a Parisian brand with international reach, appreciated for its contemporary feminine style. The second-hand channel complements the offer and boosts engagement.

seo.description: Shopify themes for Les Petites Jupes de Prune and Les Mariés de Prune. CI/CD, SEO, and performance with advanced animations.

petites-jupes-de-prune.description: Les Petites Jupes de Prune is a French brand with a creative, digital-native positioning, an engaged audience, and strong social potential. The site showcases highly visual womenswear collections.
petites-jupes-de-prune.mission:
Front-end development at W3Lead of highly interactive Shopify themes, with strict pixel-perfect standards and a CI/CD pipeline.

  • Shopify flexible sections and maintainable templates
  • Growth smart suggestions for cross-sell
  • Ops continuous GitHub integration and controlled deployments
  • Performance lazy loading, minification, and Lighthouse audits

animations.title: Micro-Interactions
animations.text: I designed and implemented numerous micro-interactions and subtle animations on Les Petites Jupes de Prune’s website. Their purpose is to make navigation smoother and more intuitive, add a touch of dynamism to the brand’s universe, and enhance user engagement by creating a more lively and memorable experience.

seo.description: Faume Back Office PWA in Vue 2 and TypeScript. 50+ business pages, advanced RBAC, complex filters, and dynamic forms.

faume-backoffice.description: Central back office of the startup Faume, a recommerce solution for fashion brands. Progressive web app in continuous production, used daily by diverse roles: Faume admins, brand teams, retail, logistics, and customer service. Architecture designed for scale and security.
faume-backoffice.mission:
Design and development, as a freelancer for Faume, of a robust and modular PWA in Vue 2 and TypeScript, evolving for 3 years and covering more than 50 unique pages.
  • Architecture typed components, shared stores, secure routing, and signed URLs
  • RBAC role-based conditional views and actions for admins, employees, partners
  • Data large tables, advanced filters, dynamic forms, and validation
  • International multi-market and multilingual
  • Quality CI, code reviews, targeted tests, and application monitoring
faume-backoffice.info: Data displayed in the images has been replaced with random values for confidentiality reasons.

seo.description: Page Builder and faume-nuxt NPM package. Vue 3 + Nuxt + TypeScript base to generate high-performance e-commerce sites.

faume-page-builder.description: A scalable front-end foundation combining the faume-nuxt NPM package and a Page Builder interface to configure structure and design without code. Embeds the atomic design system and custom CMS logic to launch sites very quickly.
faume-page-builder.mission:
Design, as a freelancer for Faume, of the package and visual interface to industrialize e-commerce site creation.
  • Stack Vue 3, Nuxt, TypeScript, Pinia, Tailwind, ES6, SEO
  • Gains integration time reduced from several weeks to less than a day
  • Production 10+ sites generated on this base
  • Maps Mapbox integrations when needed
  • Extensibility atomic components and configurable schemas
faume-page-builder.info: The illustration is not representative of the solution; I cannot share the tool for confidentiality reasons.

seo.description: Comprehensive Figma design system implemented in Vue 3 and SCSS. Generate brands with near-zero custom CSS.

faume-design-system.description: Multi-brand design system stemming from experience on 40+ e-commerce sites. Exhaustive definition of UI patterns, variables, and variants in Figma, then pixel-perfect implementation in Vue 3 and SCSS to deliver a stable, modular base that deploys very fast.
faume-design-system.mission:
Atomic strategy and unified component library, delivered as a freelancer for Faume, to accelerate production and ensure UX consistency.
  • Figma tokens, variants, guidelines, and page kits
  • Front end typed Vue 3 components, organized SCSS styles
  • Delivery new brand generated in a few hours
  • Quality cross-site consistency and minimized CSS debt

seo.description: Front-end work on an Airbus scope. Clean integrations and industrial-grade requirements.

airbus.description: Airbus is a global leader in aerospace with civil and military products and services. Interfaces follow high standards of reliability and accessibility in a critical industrial context.
airbus.mission:
Front-end development within Fidesio with precise integrations and adherence to software quality standards.
  • UI reusable components and accessibility
  • Performance performance budgets and controlled loading
  • Delivery collaboration with product teams and tooled workflows

seo.description: Website for Éditions Didier, a publishing house founded in 1898 specializing in foreign languages and educational resources.

editions-didier.description: Éditions Didier is part of the Hachette group and is recognized for expertise in foreign languages and educational content. The house publishes for French and international markets and relies on innovative digital offerings.
editions-didier.mission:
Front-end development within Fidesio, pixel-perfect from mockups, with emphasis on readability and editorial SEO.
  • UI editorial templates, lists, and book pages
  • Accessibility typographic hierarchy and keyboard navigation
  • SEO semantic markup, metadata, and internal linking
editions-didier.info: This website no longer exists since its merger with the Hatier group.

seo.description: Front-end improvements to Epycure’s e-commerce in React. Headless Shopify architecture and atomic design.

epycure.description: Epycure is a wellness DNVB running a headless e-commerce on Shopify. The goal is to offer a fast, clear experience for personalization and subscription.

Front-end interventions at W3Lead on a headless storefront for performance and conversion.

seo.description: Recommerce platform for Balzac Paris in Nuxt and Vue 3. Modular architecture and responsible UX.

balzac.description: Balzac Paris is a French brand committed to more responsible fashion. Its retail and digital ecosystem relies on an active community and reissued capsules.
balzac.mission:
Setup, as a freelancer for Faume, of a Nuxt/Vue 3 front end aligned with the responsible DNA and performance expectations.

french-bandit.mission:
Theme evolutions at W3Lead to improve readability, average order value, and perceived speed.

seo.description: Front end of Butagaz’s online subscription platform. Customer-experience POC for green energy.

butagaz.description: Butagaz is a multi-energy provider in France offering, among other things, green gas. The project aimed to test a modern, educational subscription experience around the energy transition.
butagaz.mission:
Front-end development within the Fidesio team for a POC focused on clarity and efficiency.
  • Journey guided subscription and explicit states
  • Data consumption view and refill anticipation
  • UX accessible, responsive interfaces
butagaz.info: This platform no longer exists as Butagaz has stopped offering this service to individuals.

seo.description: Front interfaces for a major agri-industrial player. Performance and robustness standards.

groupe-soufflet.description: Groupe Soufflet, now within InVivo, is a key European player in cereals and agri-industrial processing, operating from collection to international markets.
groupe-soufflet.mission:
Front-end integrations within Fidesio, compliant with business constraints and sector data volumes.
  • UI data tables and business views

groupe-soufflet.info: This version of the website is no longer current since Groupe Soufflet was acquired by Groupe InVivo.

seo.description: Doctolien medical application for LEO Pharma in Angular. Refined journey and healthcare-grade compliance.

leo-pharma.description: LEO Pharma is a Danish group focused on dermatology, majority-owned by the LEO Foundation. International presence and strong R&D culture.
leo-pharma.mission:
Development within Fidesio of an Angular application with quality and accessibility requirements specific to healthcare.
  • UI reliable forms and clear messages
  • Security best practices and role management
  • Performance optimized packaging and controlled loading

seo.description: Theater in Paris cultural platform. Booking journey for an international audience.

theater-in-paris.description: Theater in Paris makes Parisian shows accessible to a global audience through an online booking experience and multilingual support.
theater-in-paris.mission:
Front-end developments within Fidesio focused on conversion and instant understanding of the offer.

Implementation, as a freelancer for Faume, of a sustainable rock-chic boutique The Kooples multilingual with Nuxt and Vue 3: customers can resell their iconic pieces for store credits for second-hand articles selected by the stylists.

seo.description: Modular Account package for the Faume ecosystem. Vue 2 & Vuex, GitHub CI/CD, deployed on 30+ sites and maintained for 4+ years.

account-package.description: Faume is a French startup specialized in recommerce for fashion brands. It operates white-label resale and second-hand platforms, equipping retail, logistics, customer service, and marketing teams to industrialize circular fashion.
account-package.mission:
As a freelancer for Faume, I designed and developed a fully modular Account package in Vue 2 with Vuex to accelerate multi-brand e-commerce deployment. A variable- and variant-based configuration system allows the UI to adapt seamlessly to each brand’s identity. The module is versioned, offering a choice between static texts or API-based translations. It has been deployed on more than 30 sites and actively maintained for over 4 years with a GitHub CI/CD pipeline.
  • Features order history with detail pages, return initiation and real-time tracking of returns and refunds, dashboard of user-sold items, address book management, profile and account editing, gift card management and balance overview
  • Stack Vue 2, Vuex, SCSS, NPM
  • Ops GitHub CI/CD continuous deployment

seo.description: Shopify order tracking NPM package for Faume. Vue 2 & Vuex, GitHub monorepo CI/CD, used on 25+ sites and maintained for 3+ years.

order-tracking.description: Faume provides turnkey recommerce solutions for fashion brands with a shared technical foundation and reusable modules to ensure performance, reliability, and a consistent user experience across its portfolio of websites.
order-tracking.mission:
As a freelancer for Faume, I developed an NPM package dedicated to Shopify order tracking, built within a GitHub monorepo alongside the Account module to share dependencies, standards, and maintenance. Implemented in Vue 2 with Vuex, the package is scalable and modular, centralizes versioning, and ensures a consistent user experience across multiple e-commerce sites. Continuously deployed via GitHub CI/CD, it is used by more than 25 websites and has been actively maintained for over 3 years.
  • Scope standardized tracking UI, state management, Shopify integration patterns
  • Stack Vue 2, Vuex, SCSS, NPM
  • Ops GitHub CI/CD, monorepo

seo.description: Landing page for W3Lead Agency built with React and Gatsby. Advanced animations, responsive clip-path effects, and SEO optimization.

w3lead.description: W3Lead is a French web agency specializing in e-commerce and high-end digital projects. Known for delivering pixel-perfect Shopify themes and custom front-end architectures, the agency emphasizes technical precision and strong design integration.
w3lead.mission:
As a front-end developer at W3Lead, I created the agency’s showcase website using React and Gatsby. The project pushed technical boundaries with advanced animations based on complex mathematical calculations, including responsive clip-path effects. By prioritizing CSS over heavy JavaScript, I delivered a smooth, performant, and visually striking user experience aligned with the agency’s cutting-edge standards.
  • Stack React, Gatsby, TypeScript, SCSS, ES6
  • Animations advanced motion design and clip-path effects with mathematical calculations
  • Performance CSS-driven rendering prioritized over JS for smoother UX
  • SEO Gatsby static rendering and meta optimization
  • Outcome one of the most technically demanding projects reflecting W3Lead’s expertise

question1.question: What services does Maëva Pasteur offer?
question1.answer: Maëva Pasteur offers fullstack development services: Vue.js and Nuxt frontend architectures, REST API development with Node.js Express and MongoDB, PWA and MVP from prototype to final product, pixel-perfect integrations, and Shopify e-commerce development.

question2.question: What technologies does Maëva Pasteur use?
question2.answer: Maëva Pasteur masters Vue.js, Nuxt.js, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, TypeScript, JavaScript, SCSS, Tailwind CSS and Shopify to create performant and scalable fullstack web solutions.

question3.question: How to contact Maëva Pasteur?
